description_en: UNESCO World Heritage site with ruins of Thailand's first capital and ancient temples
description_nl: UNESCO Werelderfgoed met ruïnes van Thailand's eerste hoofdstad en oude tempels
highlights: UNESCO World Heritage|First Thai capital|Ancient temples|Historical ruins

description_en: Main temple of Sukhothai with iconic lotus-bud chedi and Buddha statues
description_nl: Hoofdtempel van Sukhothai met iconische lotus-knop chedi en Boeddhabeelden

description_en: Famous temple housing massive seated Buddha statue visible through narrow opening
description_nl: Beroemde tempel met massaal zittend Boeddhabeeld zichtbaar door smalle opening
highlights: Massive seated Buddha|Narrow opening|Iconic temple|Ancient architecture

description_en: Picturesque temple on small island surrounded by lotus pond
description_nl: Pittoreske tempel op klein eiland omringd door lotusvijver

description_en: Museum showcasing Sukhothai artifacts including the famous Ramkhamhaeng inscription
description_nl: Museum met Sukhothai artefacten inclusief de beroemde Ramkhamhaeng inscriptie

description_en: Hilltop temple with standing Buddha statue and panoramic views of the plains
description_nl: Heuvel tempel met staand Boeddhabeeld en panoramisch uitzicht over de vlaktes

description_en: Sister city ruins with well-preserved temples and ancient kilns
description_nl: Zusterstad ruïnes met goed bewaarde tempels en oude ovens
highlights: Sister city ruins|Ancient kilns|Well-preserved temples|Historical significance

description_en: Temple famous for elephant-supported chedi in Sri Lankan style
description_nl: Tempel beroemd om olifant-ondersteunde chedi in Sri Lankaanse stijl
highlights: Elephant-supported chedi|Sri Lankan style|Unique architecture|Ancient temple

description_en: Scenic river perfect for boat trips cycling along banks and sunset views
description_nl: Schilderachtige rivier perfect voor boottochten fietsen langs oevers en zonsondergang

description_en: Local night market with traditional food handicrafts and cultural atmosphere
description_nl: Lokale nachtmarkt met traditioneel eten handwerk en culturele sfeer
